description:
Hi! My name is Monica Sevilla. I have been teaching common core math and science classes at the secondary level for 20 years. In this course, I will be sharing my expertize and strategies in pre-algebra with you in this course.

In this course, you will learn and understand the fundamentals of Common Core pre-Algebra. You will understand and be able to perform the basic mathematical and algebraic operations that will prepare you for Algebra I.

This course will teach you pre-algebra in a step by step manner. It is perfect for first time students, reviewing basic algebraic concepts, students with special needs, second language learners, and students who like learning at their own pace.

This course is growing and evolving. It will contain video tutorials, practice problems and quizzes. Your feedback is important.
title: Common Core Pre-Algebra
